[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547531d963687250308a0200#post_547531d963687250308a0200
I hear that Tamers is super dark.[/bq]
Dude; one of the tamers had a full blown mental breakdown and started talking to her puppet and mentally got partially assimilated into a thing that's sole purpose was to kill everything and she willingly desired to kill everyone.  It may have been a "kid's show" but it pushed that kid's rating beyond belief.

Digimon: we'll willingly uncensored kill people and main characters.

Frontier did have one dark moment; they killed a human character.
